Name: Seabreeze
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Many don't bother to shake this simple drink, instead simply "building" by pouring ingredients into ice-filled glass and then briefly stirring to mix.
History: Marketing by Absolut Vodka and Ocean Spray helped drive this cocktail's popularity throughout the 1990s but the Seabreeze may have originated in the 1980s or even 1960s along with the Harpoon .
Nutrition: One serving of Seabreeze contains 159 calories
